name: Vanished (HardEggGames)
description:
Vanished Stay in the light A game where the light is the only place you are safe in Made for the Weekly Game Jam, Week 144

A game where you must solve light based puzzles to get to the end. Move the lamps and move around obstacles to get to the finishing lightbulb. Both Windows and Mac builds are available for free download below. Have fun!
